_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four divine abidings [mn7:22.4]: Spreading a heart full of love
Spreading a heart full of compassion
Spreading a heart full of rejoicing
Spreading a heart full of equanimity
The understanding of a mendicant who is: Freed from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance
Understanding that rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.
